job_title: Claims / Account Service Officer
description:
Key Job Responsibilities: 

Support Vice President in day-to-day claims management, client servicing/developments, preparing claim reports and other documents
Provide advice and training to clients on claim reporting and the processes 
Handle and resolve claims inquiries from clients and insurers
Enhance claim system and workflow
Analyse reported claim to establish whether it satisfies the policy conditions
Handle new and renewal policy administration

Education:
University Graduate or Matriculation

Professional Qualification:
At the final stage of ACII or Senior Associate ANZII examination

Working Experience: Minimum 2 years past working experience in handling general insurance claim and general client servicing.  Experience in serving construction related clients/products/claims is an absolute advantage.

Languages:
Proficient in both written and spoken English.  Ability in Putonghua communication is an advantage.

job_title: Assistant Account Director / Senior Account Manager - 5 days work
description:
Job Responsibilities 



Reporting to the Account Director, the successful candidate will assist to serve major corporate accounts and explore business development opportunities in general insurance.
Always act in a client’s best interest to deliver quality and professional service including but preparation of underwriting specifications, assisting in producing client proposals, analysis and presentations etc as required and providing assistance regarding client account issues.
Establish and maintain good relationship with clients, insurers and business partners.
Understand our clients’ needs and requirements and negotiate with insurers for competitive terms and conditions.

 Job Requirements 



10 years or above working experience in general insurance field. Experience in handling insurance of sizeable corporate clients and knowledge with construction projects will be an advantage. Candidates with less experience will be considered as Senior Account Manager.
Preferable graduate in risk management or insurance aspect. 
Progress in professional qualifications in Insurance (like CII or ANZIIF etc.) would be an asset.
Out-going and sociable character.
Proficiency in MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint.
Excellent command of spoken & written English and Chinese.
Exceptional client relationship management capabilities with good interpersonal & communication skills.
Able to work independently and a good team player.
Self-motivated and committed to quality and continuous improvement.


  * Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Interested candidate please send full resume with salary expected to: Human Resources Department (Recruitment), Unit 1608, 16/F Chevalier Commercial Centre, 8 Wang Hoi Road, Kowloon Bay, Kowloon or by clicking the Apply Now button.

Please visit our website www.nova-insure.com for more details.

All information collected for recruitment purpose only.

description:

MDRT 國際百萬圓桌會會員 - Million Dollar Round Table

GAMA- Rookie Manager Award (RMA)
LUA The Best Financial Planner Award - Merit (2017)
SCMP/IFPHK Financial Planner Awards - 1st Round Winner (2016)
IIQE 1,2,3,4,5，包括MPFA 認可強積金中介人 Licensed MPF Intermediary

ETC

商機無限:
       1.)  #政府監管 #可扣税 #自願醫保 #延期年金 #強積金自願性供款 
       2.) #免費整合強積金
       3.) #僱主各項保險 #團體醫療 #公司強積金 #公司醫療 #勞保
       4.) #所有保險 #醫保 #儲蓄 #投資 #保單檢討 #旅遊保險 #車保 #家居保 #身體檢查 

甚麼是理財策劃？相等於保險銷售嗎？
理財策劃是通過適當的財務管理，對實踐人生目標的全盤安排。宏利恪守「以客為尊」的信念，推出獨有的理財策劃三步曲：「密切聯繫 -度身策劃 -伴您成長」。理財策劃顧問必須了解客戶需要，再度身訂造合適而全面的計劃，助客戶達成目標，而非單單銷售產品。

豐厚回報與嘉許
除基本獎酬、佣金、花紅和其他福利外，宏利特設多項獎勵計劃，藉此嘉許表現超卓的理財顧問及經銷經理，與傑出員工分享業務成果，當中海外業務會議的足跡遍布全球。

夢寐以求的「百萬圓桌會」會籍
除此之外，表現出色的理財顧問更有機會揚威海外，問鼎國際獎項和殊榮。加入宏利後，我們會從各方面提供全面支援，助您持續增值和提升表現，繼而躋身享譽國際的「百萬圓桌會」，晉身全球理財業界精英之列。

優厚佣金：首年佣金，續保佣金，豐厚每月獎金，豐厚年終獎金


其他豐厚的福利：團體壽險/團體醫療保險/理財顧問獎勵計劃/人壽及傷殘入息保障/低息按揭貸款/海外業務會議

掌握自己的人生經營屬於自己的事業
宏利每一位理財顧問都致力建立屬於自己的事業和人生，演繹自己的#MyManulife。理財顧問發揮個人實力，為客戶提供優質的理財方案及服務，幫助他們作出人生中重大的理財決策。同時，您亦可成就自己的輝煌事業，並擁有自主空間，繼續為人生目標奮鬥。 

自主開創發展前路
作為專業理財顧問的搖籃，宏利設有兩條明確的事業發展路徑和清晰的晉升階梯，助您盡展潛能並發揮所長，因應個人目標奠定理想事業藍圖。
經銷管理：作為經銷經理，您需發揮出色的領導才能和團隊合作精神，不僅負責為下屬訂立業務目標及管理其日常工作，並帶領新入職顧問，在其事業發展路途上擔當專業導師角色。
理財顧問：宏利亦為理財顧問建立清晰透明的事業發展方向。只要達到指定業績要求，便可獲得晉升機會，所付出的努力得到回報。

立即聯絡預約面試，招募經理: /WhatsApp/Wechat: 94694932 (林小姐) 及 95357397 (吳先生)
分區即場面試：觀塘 偉業街223-231號 宏利金融中心 B座 3樓。

job_title: Officer / Senior Officer – Operations
description:
市場概況：
撫心自問，你喜歡每天朝九晚九，一成不變的生活嗎？你喜歡每天在辦公室勾心鬥角，爾虞我詐的環境嗎？拿著固定的薪酬每天加班為老闆創造收益真的是你想要的嗎？何不趁 2022 跳出自己的舒適區，給保險一個機會，嘗試主宰自己的人生？

與一般保險營銷有別，Project Umbrella投放大量資源於創新性的網絡營銷，吸引大量有保險意識的客戶主動查詢。網絡營銷將會是保險業發展的主流方向，而Project Umbrella的目標是提供一個介乎於傳統保險與虛擬保險之間的平台及服務。

Project Umbrella (Redefining Standards with Utmost Good Faith)：
專業化
Project Umbrella 是AXA旗下的一支團隊，由3名前澳洲執業律師和一位市場行銷專家成立，目標是建立來自不同背景年輕專業化的團隊，成員包括劍橋MBA、曾任教精算系的博士、數學系碩士、律師、持牌核數師、投行分析師、IT公司Director、持牌會計師和市場行銷專才等等。

國際化
我們的隊員包含但不限於本地香港人，內地人，英國人，加拿大人，菲律賓人，印度人等等。平時溝通兩文三語，應有盡有。我們深信不同文化，不同背景的碰撞才可以帶來進步。我們的客戶來自世界各地，從本地人，內地人到外國人。

加入保險業就是創業，再沒有人會督促你每天工作。你的決心和目標將成為你工作最大推動力。

作為新入職的你初期總會面對各種困難，而每個人成功達到目標的方法都不一樣。正因為我們都走過相同的路，我們明白你所面對的情境。經理不是你的上級，而是作為一個引導者，是你工作上的合夥人，在你創業的路上提供支援。

最後，我們希望彼此不只是工作上的伙伴，而且是生活上，人生道路上的伙伴。
按此了解我們更多: https://www.facebook.com/projectumbrellahk

團隊理念：
我們有一個理念，就是要將專業知識、責任感及誠信帶進保險業，並注重每個人在個人業務和建立團隊上的發展。你的成功就是我們的成功，團隊合作是團隊可持續發展的關鍵。保險，既是一個必需品，也是一門專業。這個團隊將有一天會改變香港人對保險的既有印象。

您的責任:
1. 為香港、內地及海外客戶提供有別于銀行的專業理財規劃，包括：保險/風險管理策劃、財富管理建議、投資策劃、及退休策劃
2. 了解客戶需求，提供專業意見及度身訂造的理財及風險管理方案
3. 建立個人形象、工作理念及團隊理念
4. 協助並參與團隊網上行銷
5. 建立及管理屬於自己的團隊，為將來成為領導者而鋪路

招募對象:
1. 良好溝通能力
2. 願意學習以及挑戰自我
3. 大學生優先，歡迎應屆畢業生及IANG，大學學位或以上可享額外津貼


待遇：
定額準貼（$10,000 -$50,000) + 佣金  (大學畢業生可Double傭金)
全港最多，一年9次花紅
Project Umbrella 導師親自進行新人教學，首年貼身輔助
達標享受公司醫療福利
公司海外旅遊獎賞
區域海外旅遊獎賞
協助申請IANG
AXA 專業培訓學院提供全面入職及在職培訓

有興趣申請者請按Apply Now 申請。

description:

Insurance

Hang Seng Bank was one of Hong Kong's bancassurance pioneers with insurance business footprint started since 1965. You will be contributing in developing and implementing of individual health insurance’s strategy to achieve strategic objectives and financial targets. In addition to this, you will be supporting after sale services in individual health insurance business.

Main Responsibilities

Support sales in individual health insurance business for both life and non-life units – providing insurance products assistance (pre-sale and post-sale enquiries) to sales/broker, medical and healthcare service providers
Co-ordinate with different departments to manage the selling process and monitor the after-sale servicing issues to provide high quality service
Monitor and implement the underwriting and operations processes & identify areas of improvement to enhance operational efficiency and service standard.
Collect feedbacks and review health insurance policies and guidelines & act as an advisor on medical/health services.
Assist all aspects of policy servicing with respect to New Health Insurance Business and/or New Health Products
Support marketing initiatives to other business units for business development activities.

Requirement

At least 5-8 years’ working experience in medical insurance operation.

job_title: 不一樣的理財顧問/保險代理 (改革保險業)
description:
市場概況：
撫心自問，你喜歡每天朝九晚九，一成不變的生活嗎？你喜歡每天在辦公室勾心鬥角，爾虞我詐的環境嗎？拿著固定的薪酬每天加班為老闆創造收益真的是你想要的嗎？何不趁 2022 跳出自己的舒適區，給保險一個機會，嘗試主宰自己的人生？

與一般保險營銷有別，Project Umbrella投放大量資源於創新性的網絡營銷，吸引大量有保險意識的客戶主動查詢。網絡營銷將會是保險業發展的主流方向，而Project Umbrella的目標是提供一個介乎於傳統保險與虛擬保險之間的平台及服務。

Project Umbrella (Redefining Standards with Utmost Good Faith)：
專業化
Project Umbrella 是AXA旗下的一支團隊，由3名前澳洲執業律師和一位市場行銷專家成立，目標是建立來自不同背景年輕專業化的團隊，成員包括劍橋MBA、曾任教精算系的博士、數學系碩士、律師、持牌核數師、投行分析師、IT公司Director、持牌會計師和市場行銷專才等等。

國際化
我們的隊員包含但不限於本地香港人，內地人，英國人，加拿大人，菲律賓人，印度人等等。平時溝通兩文三語，應有盡有。我們深信不同文化，不同背景的碰撞才可以帶來進步。我們的客戶來自世界各地，從本地人，內地人到外國人。

加入保險業就是創業，再沒有人會督促你每天工作。你的決心和目標將成為你工作最大推動力。

作為新入職的你初期總會面對各種困難，而每個人成功達到目標的方法都不一樣。正因為我們都走過相同的路，我們明白你所面對的情境。經理不是你的上級，而是作為一個引導者，是你工作上的合夥人，在你創業的路上提供支援。

最後，我們希望彼此不只是工作上的伙伴，而且是生活上，人生道路上的伙伴。
按此了解我們更多: https://www.facebook.com/projectumbrellahk

團隊理念：
我們有一個理念，就是要將專業知識、責任感及誠信帶進保險業，並注重每個人在個人業務和建立團隊上的發展。你的成功就是我們的成功，團隊合作是團隊可持續發展的關鍵。保險，既是一個必需品，也是一門專業。這個團隊將有一天會改變香港人對保險的既有印象。

您的責任:
1. 為香港、內地及海外客戶提供有別于銀行的專業理財規劃，包括：保險/風險管理策劃、財富管理建議、投資策劃、及退休策劃
2. 了解客戶需求，提供專業意見及度身訂造的理財及風險管理方案
3. 建立個人形象、工作理念及團隊理念
4. 協助並參與團隊網上行銷
5. 建立及管理屬於自己的團隊，為將來成為領導者而鋪路

招募對象:
1. 良好溝通能力
2. 願意學習以及挑戰自我
3. 大學生優先，歡迎應屆畢業生及IANG，大學學位或以上可享額外津貼


待遇：
定額準貼（$10,000 -$50,000) + 佣金  (大學畢業生可Double傭金)
全港最多，一年9次花紅
Project Umbrella 導師親自進行新人教學，首年貼身輔助
達標享受公司醫療福利
公司海外旅遊獎賞
區域海外旅遊獎賞
協助申請IANG
AXA 專業培訓學院提供全面入職及在職培訓

有興趣申請者請按Apply Now 申請。

個人化培訓 ; 年輕專業國際化

job_title: Account Manager (General Insurance)
description:
Your New Job with UPS Capital®️ Hong Kong.

Nobody understands transportation and logistics like United Parcel Service (UPS). And while you’ve probably never thought of a UPS company for financing and insurance services, the global supply chain expertise of UPS Capital®️ uniquely positions us to help protect companies from risk and leverage cash in their supply chains. Insurance companies and banks can’t say that. 

We are currently looking for an ambitious Account Manager (General Insurance) working in our Hong Kong office to cope with our business growth.

What Do We Expect Of You?


Expand business development opportunities by building partnerships with various sales resources (e.g. UPS, Supply Chain Solutions, UPS Freight, external customers, etc.) to improve network for providing sales leads
Attends strategy sessions to find UPS Capital opportunities in UPS target accounts.
Calls on prospects (i.e., conference calls, phone calls, and in person visits) to qualify prospects for fit with UPS Capital solutions which involves Parcel Pro, “Jewelers’ Block”, small parcel insurance, Marine Cargo, Trade Credit Protection, Product Liability and/or other general insurance products and to schedule appointments.
Researches potential customer information (e.g., financial status, products sold, markets, etc.) to ensure viable prospect and to support credit application.
Conducts sales visits to prospective customers to present UPS Capital value proposition as it relates to their company and needs.
Conducts due diligence (e.g., inventory audit, financial analysis, etc.) to verify the financial status of the company complies with UPS Capital business requirements (e.g., risk, profitability, etc.)
Monitor and maintains account relationships to ensure integration of new business/ cross selling and continued customer satisfaction

What Skills Do You Need?

Passed the both IIQA Papers 1 & 2
Have proven at least 3 years general insurance field sales experience is a MUST
Have a sales hunter mentality with a desire to win and grow your business
Great territory planning skills and a willingness to travel within the Asia Pacific Region including China (if necessary)
Excellent communication skills with experience of creating and delivering presentations
Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word and PowerPoint); Language proficiency in spoken and written English and Chinese (Putonghua inclusive). 
 What We Will Give You in Return?
 A competitive salary based on experience
A truly uncapped sales incentive
Healthcare package
Pension Scheme
A unique opportunity to join a growing part of the UPS Family that offers progression opportunities

description:

我們植根香港，於1998年啟業，一直「以人為本，以客為先」，糅合專業與關懷， 成就無數客戶的理想。我們視顧客為終身夥伴，提供優質而專業的服務和壽險方案； 我們講求效益，為股東創增價值；中銀人壽財富管理團隊是香港特有銀行背景的服 務團隊，除人壽保險及財務策劃服務外，同時提供一站式銀行服務轉介，讓客戶掌 握全面的理財優勢和便利。 中銀人壽為配合大灣區經濟發展優勢，積極拓展業務。

現誠邀 優秀人才加盟我們的財富管理團隊: 

財富管理經理 / 分部經理 (4天工作)

職位要求:
· 大學畢業 (歡迎國內及海外大學畢業生)
· 性格成熟主動
· 良好人際溝通技巧及表達能力
· 具銀行經驗優先

待遇及福利:
· 豁免保險中介人牌照考試費
· 每月收入可達港元5萬*
· 醫療及人壽保障
· 全方位在職專業培訓
· 海外會議及旅遊參加資格
· 良好晉升階梯

*收入受業績及工作表現等因素影響，並非保證

有意者請將履歷電郵至
所有已收集之個人資料只會用於職位招聘用途。 有關中銀人壽「個人資料收集聲明」 詳情，可瀏覽中銀人壽網頁 www.boclife.com.hk。

job_title: Wealth management program
description:
Do you want to be part of a dynamic and ambitious team and get training from professional wealth managers to gain experience that will help you build the career you want?We are looking for dedicated and enthusiastic interns for our team in the financial services and wealth management industry. This is a paid internship program that can develop into a long-term employment opportunity. The starting period is flexible and we are open to negotiation.

Through this training, you will learn to provide professional financial services, from risk management to wealth management to individual clients. There will also be many opportunities to connect with corporate clients through various group medical and social care solutions. Together with our team, you will proactively explore potential markets for corporate expansions.

It would be a great opportunity for anyone keen on the finance industry, which provides you with an opportunity to continuously acquire professional financial knowledge and skills to facilitate career development.

We are also looking for elites who are currently studying in the third year, preferably in the second year or above, and speak English fluently.

Working with senior managers, trainees will gain knowledge in wealth management (consisting of risk management, investment management, savings management and retirement management), financial senses, and various investment tools through this internship program.


Interested candidates, please click apply now.

company: Aon Services Hong Kong Limited 怡安服務香港有限公司
job_title: Assistant Account Executive - General Insurance
description:
We’re hiring!

Aon is currently recruiting an Assistant Account Executive - General Insurance to join our team in Hong Kong.

About Aon

Headquartered in London, Aon Plc is a leading global professional services firm providing a broad range of risk, retirement and health solutions. Our 50,000 colleagues in 120 countries empower results for clients by using proprietary data and analytics to deliver insights that reduce volatility and improve performance.

At Aon, you’ll be part of a team which will support and inspire you and provide the opportunities and resources to develop your skills. It’s an environment which encourages you to achieve your best - together we’ll empower results. 

Responsibilities:

Prepare policy endorsements and debit notes
Process policy renewals and claims
Carry out general clerical admin. work and file storage housekeeping
Assist in any other ad-hoc tasks as assigned by Supervisors

Requirements:

At least 1 year of clerical working experience; knowledge in Insurance preferred
Passed in IIQE papers is an advantage
Well-organized with good administration skills
Good command of spoken and written English and Chinese
Good command of computer skills including Microsoft Word, Excel and Chinese Typing

How to Apply

Your opportunity to empower results could start right here. Make your mark and apply online today with a brief covering letter and your resume, sharing relevant achievements for this position.

We Offer You

A competitive total rewards package, continuing education & training, and tremendous potential with a growing worldwide organization.

Our Colleague Experience

Every day, our colleagues make a difference, work with the best, own their potential, and value one another. Together, we share this one purpose: to empower economic and human possibility around the world. This unifying goal is at the heart of our identity, and it lives in everything we do. To learn more about our colleague experience, visit Aon Colleague Experience.

Aon is an equal opportunities employer. We are committed to creating a winning and inclusive culture where everyone feels valued and has opportunities for growth and development.

job_title: Wealth Management Manager /Trainee/2022 Graduate Program
description:
As we grow, you GLOW
YOUR FUTURE IS HERE
Come join us!

Our people are our greatest assets, and we committed to provide an environment where you can thrive and be successful.

A Career with AIA Challenge District 精英團隊，執行細節

AIA Challenge District is committed to service excellence. Our people are our most important asset and play a vital role in our efforts to continually enhance our performance for customers and provide best-in-class products and services. We seek to attract high-calibre talent by offering a dynamic working environment, good career development opportunities and competitive compensation packages.

Million Dollar Round Table (MDRT) is an international recognition / achievement that recognizes top 1% financial service professionals worldwide. AIA Challenge District has both the highest number and ratio of MDRTs in AIA in the last 13 years. It provides an excellent platform for young professionals with ambition to reach his/her potential.

About the job

Dynamic workplace with talented and professional colleagues who are passionate about their work - this has enabled you to excel in both you career and in life. To start your journey, you will be taking part in our well-planned pre-job arrangement of getting to know us. Deep dives into our purpose, strategy, and values and how they impact what we do.

Job Descriptions:

Provide professional financial analysis & comprehensive planning strategies to wealthiest clients including risk management and retirement solutions
Identifying needs of clients and providing professional financial advice
Develop and maintain close relationship with clients and review their financial portfolios periodically  
Develop and build your own team by implementing strategic planning for team management
Providing financial analyst, investment, saving, retirement, MPF and risk management services
Provide quality after-sales services to maintain good customer relationship

 We look for:

Bachelor's degree or Diploma holder above
Energetic, self­-motivated, responsible, hardworking and willing to learn
Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
Good communication and customer service skills
Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese
Experience in banking industry or background in mainland will be an advantage

** Fresh graduates / IANG visa holders will also be considered

We offer:

Outstanding Candidates will be awarded scholarship and Graduate opportunities
We Offer Professional pre-job and on-job training will be provided
Internship Certificate and reference letter Scholarship will be offered to outstanding students
IIQE paper 1, 3 &5 courses and examination, Full fee subsidy overseas trips and conventions annually
Monthly allowance + attractive commission package (15,000 - 50,000) + incentives and year-end bonus
Fast track to management level
Flexible working hours
Work-life balance

Company Overview

About the AIA Group

AIA Group Limited and its subsidiaries (collectively “AIA” or the “Group”) comprise the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group. It has operations in 18 markets in Asia-Pacific – wholly-owned branches and subsidiaries in Hong Kong, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, China, Korea, the Philippines, Australia, Indonesia, Taiwan, Vietnam, New Zealand, Macau, Brunei, a 97 per cent subsidiary in Sri Lanka, a 26 per cent joint venture in India and a representative office in Myanmar. 

AIA is listed on the Main Board of The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited, the third-largest IPO ever globally in October 2010, under the stock code “1299” with American Depositary Receipts (Level 1) traded on the over-the-counter market (ticker symbol: “AAGIY”). As at Feburary 2019, AIA is the second largest constituents of The Hang Seng Indexes. 

Our products ranging from individual life, group life, accident, medical and health, personal lines insurance to investment-linked products with over 100 investment options. We are also dedicated to providing superb product solution to meet the distinguished financial needs of high net worth customers. 

About MDRT

Founded in 1927, the Million Dollar Round Table (MDRT), The Premier Association of Financial Professionals®, is a global, independent association of more than 42,000 of the world's leading life insurance and financial services professionals from more than 470 companies in 71 countries. MDRT members demonstrate exceptional professional knowledge, strict ethical conduct and outstanding client service. MDRT membership is recognized internationally as the standard of excellence in the life insurance and financial services business.

 當下AIA的服務及產品多元化，提供最佳的事業發展平台。投身財務策劃工作，可追求自主工作模式，幫到人又可享受 work-life balance，何樂而不為？

 本區域來自AIA歷史最悠久的「成功家族」，多年來擁有MDRT District的美譽，培育出非常多青年才俊，大部分也可在25歲前獲得MDRT資格。由MDRT經理團隊提供培訓，及直屬經理提供 one on one 職前及在職指導，助你事業快速起步，合資格者更可被推介入  Premier Academy友邦精英學院。

有目標感、責任心; 對工作有熱誠，能主動學習

job_title: Director/Associate Director-Business Development
description:
TRM (HK) Limited is a leading work injury management company in Hong Kong. We are looking for an enthusiastic candidate to take up this challenging post who will lead the business development team to promote the business model to insurers and corporations in Hong Kong. 

The job duties including:

To promote the work injury management model to insurers and corporation clients on Employees' Compensation claims in Hong Kong
To review and enhance the present business model to meet the clients' changing requirement and expectations
To increase the market share in Employees' Compensation business
To develop other insurance claims business such as motor claims, person injuries claims. 
To hold regular review meeting to ensure the staff to perform up to the company/client standards
To work with IT team and service providers to develop various system to enhance the handling processes
To oversee the running of claims management, case management and rehabilitation team
Candidates with previous working experience in brokers, loss adjusting firms, insurance firms will be preferable.

About AXA


AXA Hong Kong and Macau has been offering a wide range of life, health, property and casualty protection, as well as wealth management and retirement solutions to help customers achieve stability and prosperity. Today, over 1.5 million customers in Hong Kong and Macau, from individuals to established businesses, count on AXA Hong Kong and Macau to financially protect them, their loved ones and their future1.

As a member of the AXA Group, we share a set of defined values and commitment, which drives our winning strategy to become a global leader in insurance, wealth management and retirement planning. Founded in early 19th century, AXA Group's 108 million customers2 worldwide are serviced by 160,000 employees2 in 57 countries2. AXA Group registered revenues amounted to Euro 103.5 billion (around HK$billionaire)3 and had Euro 969 billion (around HK$8,478.8billion)3 in assets under management.
